thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 5 of 447
thread.title: Edward Oleskewicz

author: Edward Oleskewicz
title: Edward Oleskewicz
text: I went online and found the car I wanted got a confirmation number that I was approved for credit I was in and out of that place driving home in my new car in less than 2 hours they are great people to deal with their very very helpful I got a great car great payment I couldn't change anything I wanted to they need to keep up the great work
